title: Unemployment rate for persons aged 15 years and above fell to 3.2% in FY23
description: New Delhi: India's estimated unemployment rate for individuals aged 15 years and above fell to 3.2% in fiscal year 2023 (FY23), a significant decline from 6% in FY18, according to the labour ministry. The ministry's numbers are based on the latest Annual Periodic Labour Force Survey (PLFS) report an...
